website_summaries.verdict: Use this 10-inch cake lifter from Fat Daddio's to lift even rich, moist cakes without sticking.
cons: Too heavy for some to lift comfortably

customer_reviews.title: Great QUALITY spatula/cake lifter!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this cake lifter/spatula today, so I haven't used it yet....HOWEVER....I can CLEARLY see that this spatula is made of very good quality! It has a nice, sturdy weight (but not too heavy!) and is not flimsy at all like other brands. Im very confident that this lifter is sturdy enough to lift & transfer my heavy cakes & cheesecakes without worrying about it not being able to hold their weight. I highly recommend this QUALITY spatula/cake lifter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Green

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for more than just cakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool because I was making nine cakes for my daughter's wedding and I knew I would be needing goid tools to get the job done. The Wedding was over six months ago and the Fat Daddy was of great use but the best news is that since then I've found many more uses for it in the kitchen. I'm partially disabled so my husband helps me cook, I have often tell to him to grab the Fat Daddy when we are lifting something heavy or unwieldy. It has really come in handy, so happy with this product and purchace!
customer_reviews.author: L. Payton

customer_reviews.title: What a difference
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen tool is a wonderful addition to my kitchen. I have used it for "scooping up" fragile cheese cakes made with ricotta cheese with ease...after fumbling with other so called "lifters" ~ they did not serve me well! They left my hard work and pretty presentations cracked and ugly..but not this Fat Daddio's Lifter! Wow, what a difference. Every baker needs this tool!
customer_reviews.author: Schweetie

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch!!!
customer_reviews.text: The description states 8”x10”. The package says 9”x7”. The actual surface area of the spatula is 7”x 8 1/2” so, as a pizza peel it’s unuseable.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny R Gancos

customer_reviews.title: It makes a decent pizza peel.
customer_reviews.text: We make our pizza from scratch and they have a tendency to stick to stones and pizza trays. We needed something to slide under them to break them free and something long with a handle seemed like a good idea. It works for that purpose and a number of years later it’s still doing it. I haven’t used it for baking very often because silicone mats are much easier but if there’s any lip on the pan this is more difficult to use. No complaints but 5-stars just seemed a bit too much for a tool that spends so much time, and takes up a lot of space, in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Working perfect
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working perfectly. My previous method of transferring cakes using regular sized kitchen spatulas wasn't cutting it. I've used this a number of times so far and it's been fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Vida

customer_reviews.title: Great Pancake Flipper
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to flip pancakes on our outdoor griddle. It's a little heavy but works well and you can flip a big pancake quickly without a mess.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Makes moving cakes a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Moving cake parts around for my birthday cake extravaganzas was always a challenge, but this giant spatula has made cake building easier. It definitely relieved a pain point in baking and that's the sign of a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Baker’s essential tool
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how long I struggled moving layer cakes from one surface to another without damage. This is an America’s Test Kitchen recommendation which is my bible. If you bake cakes you need this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen T.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have as a baker
customer_reviews.text: This giant “fat daddio” spatula works splendidly! It does everything I need to to do so with ease. Lofts and transports cakes with no worries of dropping or cracking the cake in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Fat Daddio's Cake Lifter/Jumbo Cookie Spatula
customer_reviews.text: I first became acquainted with this device on "America's Test Kitchen". I have looked, and looked some more, to find a cake lifter that will not bend and destroy the baked goods that I make. I make a lot of cheese cakes and I needed a way to remove the cake from the bottom of the spring form pan. I have never seen what I wanted in any store - ANY STORE. This article works very well. I am very glad that I ordered it. It arrived in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: CpC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, a little smaller than I expected (for pizzas)
customer_reviews.text: This spatula is very strong, easy to hold, and I like the feel of it. I bought it to use as a pizza peel and it's a little small for that purpose. It's big enough to get them out of the oven (when the pizza is solid) but not good at holding the raw dough. It works fine for me, though, because I build the pizza on a flat cookie sheet, slide it onto the pizza stone, and then take the pizza out with this spatula when it's done (which would be difficult to do with the cookie sheet).
customer_reviews.author: C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised with this product. It is well made and heafty enough to handle most kitchen jobs. Besides using for placing soft pizza dough on a hot baking stone without damage, I have used it for transfering pie crust into the pan, moving and perfectly placing cake layers and turning gentle egg and potato dishes in one peice. This is a great poroduct at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: MerryDJ

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: Works well for moving cakes, quick bread loaves, or cookies around. Sturdy grip.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Only cake lifter you will need!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for helping to move and lift 10 and 14 inch wedding cake layers.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny E.

customer_reviews.title: A great solution
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for most cakes, and very sturdy. We had been lifting tiers with recessed spatulas which is a sketchy proposition. This is in frequent use in a professional setting and is a great value for the price, as is the case with any Fat Daddio's product we own. They seem to have really thought through the challenges our type of shop faces with standard tools and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Ward

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing it on America's Test Kitchen. I baked their Strawberry Dream Cake and used the lifter to position the layers. It worked perfectly as advertised. It is nice and heavy so you have no fear of heavy cakes bending it and sliding off. I will probably buy one for my son who has recently started baking.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality spatula.
customer_reviews.text: Quality spatula. I use this to cook 10 lb hamburgers! (Just kidding.) I do use this with my outdoor gas griddle though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite substantial and useful for more than cakes.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. It is much more substantial than I would have thought from the description. It has a nice stainless finish and the the front edge is tapered, making it easy to get under items. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: artefx

customer_reviews.title: Great With Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: This item is handy for so many things! It's a must for lifting cake layers, especially thin layers, Removes cookies from cookie sheet in one swoop! Great for removing pizza from oven and roasted veggies/potatoes from hot pan. Flipping the super large pancake that we make couldn't be easier -- no more breaking and piecing together!
customer_reviews.author: jml

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I never had one of these before. Made it easy to move a three layer cake onto a serving plater with no mess
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Balderrama

customer_reviews.title: Don’t flip out! Let Fat Daddio do it for you!
customer_reviews.text: No more dropping bread loaves on kitchen floor! Fat Daddio can handle anything, even that heavy lump of dough you tried last family reunion.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient Arch

customer_reviews.title: Fun & helpful - pizza lifter, or for whatever items you may need
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use on a camper oven and knew it would be hard to get items out of that oven with very little space between the rack & the top... This big spatula was a just small enough to fit the width of the coleman stove top oven (the cheap one about $36-40) and just made it easy to remove & replace items in the hot oven.
customer_reviews.author: Blahoooooo

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: Since receiving this kitchen tool, I've used it for pulling hearth loaves off a baking stone and moving a cake layer. It works very well. This mega-spatula is sturdy and nicely made and would be a great gift to your favorite baker.
customer_reviews.author: Bonne L. Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: I was able to lift up my entire cheesecake & move it over to a pretty stand. Terrific!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding and durable products.
customer_reviews.text: I have other products by this company and you can’t go wrong. They are all amazing products for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LAPeachpie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: World's greatest gadget for making multi-layer cakes. Slicing a normal cake layer into to is hard to remove so you can put icing between these tiny layers. But this tool easily lifts a layer that has been sliced into two really, really well. It's heavy and really well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: This is a hefty, sturdy cake lifter. The size makes it very easy to use and it doesn't then under the weight of the cake tiers. The handle is comfortable in my hand as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosann Evans

customer_reviews.title: WOW Love this tool
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tool. I literally use it to move any large food. You absolutely need this if you make layer cakes. WOW, so much more confidence moving cake layers and completed cakes
customer_reviews.author: Al D.

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It makes moving and lifting cakes a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It makes moving and lifting cakes a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for my husband and me
customer_reviews.text: Large, thick, stiff, and too heavy for my husband and me. Disappointed. It is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable handle, substantial spatula makes lifting and turning cakes easier to prevent breaking. The perfect baker's tool.
customer_reviews.author: Macie

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo Spatula
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a large spatula and this one fits the bill. It is sturdy and quite large, facillitating the lifting of just about any cake, pie, pizza, whatever you choose, with much ease and safety. I highly recommend this product if your cooking fits the need.
customer_reviews.author: Walden

customer_reviews.title: Super Pizza Peeler
customer_reviews.text: I use this to lift a 9" pizza, baking stone and all, from the oven to apply a final coat of toppings. It does the task with ease. Plus, I sharpened the front edge with a file out in the garage so it peals the done pizza from the stone even when it wants to stick. It is perfect for these particular purposes. So sturdy you could use it to fight off Vikings if need be!
customer_reviews.author: Hookie Kookie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by America's Test Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great product...big enough to handle even larger cakes and very sturdy. It also seems to be well balanced. The handle fits my small hand well and gives me good control. As a former pastry chef, I wish I had had this 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all these years?
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite baking tool. It's generous size allows me to lift and transfer cakes (up to 12 inches thus far) with such ease I can't believe it. No more fingers in the icing or fondant! This is a must for anyone who bakes and decorates cakes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Works for my heavy layers.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a standard 9" or small layer. I'd get a larger one for bigger layers. It's thick - so far it hasn't bent even under the weight of a 4-5 layer cake with frosting and fondant.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ! use this spatula more than I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: jan thomson

customer_reviews.title: Love This Spatula
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for another kitchen tool when I came across this on Amazon. It is a wonderful solution to lifting cakes after they have been sliced in half. Also works great for pizza. I am so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: grannylinda

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Spatula!
customer_reviews.text: This is much nicer than expected. Heavy duty and will not bend under weight.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Baker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cake lifter
customer_reviews.text: Purchases this based on America's Test Kitchen review. Very helpful for lifting thin, fragile layers of cake. Sturdy but also light enough to maneuver one handed.
customer_reviews.author: Linnae Madison

customer_reviews.title: This paddle is strong and well made.
customer_reviews.text: For the price and quality look no further. Can be used for about anything to get in and out of the oven. For an extremely large pizza ( that no one makes anymore) you might want a little larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty spatula.
customer_reviews.text: This "spatula" is amazing. It's heavy and very sturdy and allows you to see what you're doing when it comes to moving cake layers and cakes. I'm very impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Demondog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose Spatula / Lifter!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, love it. Product is very useful and versatile. Barbeque fish fillets, pizzas, pancakes, cakes, quesadillas! Fantastic. Packaging and shipping was great. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: TrulyBlessed3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for moving large foods
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for moving large foods. I used this to move a frosted cake and have used for hot pizza as well.
customer_reviews.author: TrishiaK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great great quality! Heavy enough to secure moving those cake stacking layers around!
customer_reviews.author: M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: excellent tool to have on hand when needed
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the opportunity to use it yet but suspect that like a few reviewers this tool would be perfect if the front edge was beveled so it would slide to pick up more easily....If I find that an important feature - I will have it done.
customer_reviews.author: crowelady

customer_reviews.title: So far all the items I have ordered have been ...
customer_reviews.text: So far all the items I have ordered have been exactly what I wanted and have done their jobs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Pawpaw

customer_reviews.title: A must have for serious cake makers.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. A must have for stacking cake tiers. I don't know how I lived without it before I had it.
customer_reviews.author: DragoDellAqua

customer_reviews.title: Great for a baker
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter who bakes cakes as an extra source of income. This item is perfect for her to be able to move cakes with support.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for removing Butt Porks from grill without losing the bottom to the grates. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Butchiez51

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Use this as both a cake lifter and pizza lifter. Highly rated by Cooks Illustrated and I agree.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce C

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing tool for the kitchen. Great for cakes, pizzas etc. I use it heaps. Have now purchased three of them for family members and will be placing a further order soon. They are awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Useful Tool
customer_reviews.text: This cake lift is perfect for me to take a whole Salmon off the smoker along with lift on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: just the right size and was easy for me
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, just the right size and was easy for me handle
customer_reviews.author: viginia armstead

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: This lifter is great, it is very well made and heavy duty. It makes moving layers very easy when making a layer cake.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Fat Daddio's Cake Lifter - great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it Love it Love it!!! Not too big, or heavy or anything....Side note....Americas Test Kitchen recently did a test of cake lifters and this one won.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. OH

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other ones I've own
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing spatula. It is really sturdy and holds pretty heavy cakes
customer_reviews.author: V. Cheddar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it for lots of different baking reasons. Made well too
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and I'm excited to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia T Raphiel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not used it, yet, I"m sure it will suit its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: It is priced less than similar items I saw in the store. It is made well and makes it so easy to lift large baked items, baked brie, as well as large meats. I use it more than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Happy-in-NJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really love using this to lift my big cakes. It's very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Turner

customer_reviews.title: PIzza Moving Wonder
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough to hold a pizza with everything. Spatula's working area is 7 inches wide and 8-1/2 inches long. Good firm handle. I use it to help move the pizza from the wooden paddle I made it on to the heated stone in the oven. When the pizza is cooked then the spatula is great to get the pizza out of the oven. Easy to wash. Great buy and not too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: NM Norma

customer_reviews.title: The weight makes it clumsy.
customer_reviews.text: Steel spatulas are normally tempered to a certain degree so that they will be thin and spring back and that temper allows the spatula to be light. Not this one. This large spatula is just a heavy, thick piece of steel formed to the design you see. Although it does the job, it's heavy and it will bend. Additionally, the edges were sharp from the stamping operation and I had to file them down.
customer_reviews.author: Manfish

customer_reviews.title: Spatula should of given it away...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice spatula... Not what I was looking for but I like it any ways... still need to find one big enough for pizza...
customer_reviews.author: Jaysee

customer_reviews.title: perfect for midsized transfers.
customer_reviews.text: I use it when a big spatula won't fit. Like pizza in a toaster oven -- or bread dough into a Dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: Neal E. Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a smaller size, which is exactly what I wanted. If you're looking for one that is easy to use, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick steel, and well made handle. Well cut and polished. Sturdy I use it for small baked items and pizzas from the oven. I have washed it in the dishwasher a bunch of times and no rust spots or blemishes yet.
customer_reviews.author: OoThought

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for frozen pizza.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for frozen pizza and for that it works great. Haven't tried it for anything else yet, but will this winter. Main downside is that it's a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: jgeod

customer_reviews.title: We like the sturdiness of the spatula
customer_reviews.text: This spatula was just what we needed for lifting cake layers. We like the sturdiness of the spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel jackson

customer_reviews.title: What's it for?
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked me to buy her one of these for her birthday. Bit odd I thought, who eats that many cakes? Then I saw another daughter try you get a pizza out of the oven with a fork and a spoon. Ah, the spatula would be PERFECT for pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Carol kahn-Cleland

customer_reviews.title: Well done!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I make a lot of cakes and often have to list and move layers. Honestly, I think I could lift a turkey with this, it's that well made! Well done Fat Daddio!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymously

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I use my cake lifter for lots of things. It is good for pizza and hot dishes from the oven.
customer_reviews.author: s.redwine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and heavy duty! Saw on Americas Test Kitchen and they didn't disappoint as always testers are dead on.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: solid tool
customer_reviews.text: solid tool.Just as described. Years of use.Made of thick stainless steel. can be used for numerous applications.Great for the baker.
customer_reviews.author: fun guy

customer_reviews.title: sturdier than expected
customer_reviews.text: The fat Daddio cake lifter is sturdy, well made and comes in handy in the kitchen. I bought it for moving artisan breads in and out of the oven. I now use it to take about everything I bake in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: cake lifter
customer_reviews.text: this i use after i use my cake slicer i can lift and move the cae with out them breaking
customer_reviews.author: Donald Elliott Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big hit in the kitchen! So many more uses than originally thought.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy but worth the great function. Would by again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: It costs more than they quoted on PBS's Test Kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Melody R. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really made well. I doubt it will ever wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Darleen Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Cake Lifter & 8" Cake Pans
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this cake lifter yet, but it looks like excellent quality. Have been wanting one of these for sometime now, not just for cakes but for pizza and cookies. I don't do that much baking anymore so it may be awhile before I try it out. However, I love my Fat Daddio's 8" cake pans I ordered awhile back. I look forward to using my new cake lifter.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It Rusts
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this cake lifter for a couple of months and used it 2-3 times. Although it's nice and sturdy, it has started rusting in a few places - what a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Healy

customer_reviews.title: Just what the chef ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little afraid that the quality might be lacking (gauge of metal) but it works great, even on very heavy cakes. This is a great product and so useful!
customer_reviews.author: BVS

customer_reviews.title: Well made.... haven't used it yet ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made....haven't used it yet....but I'm sure it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Casey

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed, it does all the work of flipping cakes, pancakes, pullin out pizza, just great, not to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Not for Non-stick surfaces
customer_reviews.text: The cake lifter is all it says it is but my only disappointment is that it's not coated to be used on non-stick surfaces. I should have seen this before I bought it. I'd return it but it's so heavy that it would cost close to what I'd be refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.....
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a cake lifter and LOVE the Fat Daddio pans so thought this would be a good one. The cakes I make are 9 inch and above diameter and this spatula is not that wide. I dont feel it gives the delicate cakes the support needed for lifting and moving as I need. I will have to continue to look to find what I really want. The workmanship and quality of the product is really nice, just not the size to lift a standard cake.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy Lancy

customer_reviews.title: too thick
customer_reviews.text: i thought this would be good for turning pancakes, but it's just too thick. all it does is crumple the pancake up. one of these days i'll try filing it a bit thinner on the leading edge and hopefully it'll be usable. till then it's pretty worthless for what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: paul ross

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Helped me put together a three tier ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Helped me put together a three tier wedding cake: 16x8, 12x8, and 8x8. The cake was very cold so the cream did not stick to my hands if touched. The spatula has good support, but t feels as though the metal in the handle does NOT go all the way to the end. I was supporting with it an over 40 lb. tier.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Grigoryev

customer_reviews.title: They don’t make a 8” x 10” Cake Lifter.
customer_reviews.text: After multiple disappointing experiences ordering the 8” x 10” Cake Lifter, I did a little research. It turns out, Fat Daddio’s no longer makes, or never made, a 8 x 10 cake spatula. They offer the 6 1/8” x 21⁄2” Cookie Spatula, 8.75” x 7” Jumbo Spatula, and a 12 1⁄4” x 12 1⁄4” Pizza Peel. Disappointing since I really needed something to fully support an 8” x 8” cake. I guess I will continue to look for something that can move a cake, but isn’t as awkward to use as a pizza peel.
customer_reviews.author: Also Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: The product here is listed as their 10"x8" model. The one I received was the 9"x7" version. A full inch missing from around the sides is definitely problematic when delicate cakes must be lifted.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Compared to many cooking utensils
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Compared to many cooking utensils, this product is extremely well made and comfortable to use. So far, I've used it for everything but cake lifting or as a cookie spatula. It is great for putting food into or lifting food out of a hot oven, it works like a mini peel. Because it is so well made and hefty, I can lift bread loaf pans and hot soup bowls from the oven, it is also great for picking up large amounts of chopped veggies .
customer_reviews.author: ritac

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after seeing a demonstration on a cooking show. I love this spatula- not only is it good for cookies, but a variety of other baked goods, including the Japanese style crackers I bake each Christmas. Plus it is extra handy for gathering ingredients for stir frying. It is sturdy- I have no doubt it will be with me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jamerican

customer_reviews.title: Nice cake spatula!
customer_reviews.text: Really has helped me out when it comes to baking cakes and pizzas. It's heavy duty and stable and has saved me from dropping cakes on the floor. It's fairly large, not super large, but it's still wide enough to support the majority of the food I make, I'm really glad I got this!
customer_reviews.author: Krugs

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool, especially for a home baker like myself. The offset handle is strong and provides a nice grip. The stainless steel is thick and sturdy. It is slightly heavy but considering that your using it to move cakes/cake layers from point A to point B, I think this very good quality. Also, considering how high food costs are nowadays I don't worry about my costly ingredients ending up in the floor before I can get the finished product to the cake stand! A great buy and arrived the very next day.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Great item you never knew you needed!
customer_reviews.text: Jumbo spatula and cake lifter. Bought it for the cake lifting properties, but dang if it doesn't make a fantastic meatloaf lifter, too!
customer_reviews.author: artcat

customer_reviews.title: Not crucial, but a nice addition to an already well-stocked kitchen
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package and took a good look at what I had ordered, I thought to myself "Did I really and truly need this?" But you know what? I've found myself reaching for it! It's come in handy quite a few times, in particular when I've had most of a 9X13 cake that I've wanted to remove in order to store separately and free up use of the pan. So - as my title suggests - it's not something that a new-ish cook/baker should rush to buy, but it's a nice accessory for the baker who "has everything."
customer_reviews.author: SF Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something I could take homemade pizza out of the oven. This is sturdy and works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Red

product_meta.title: Fat Daddio's Cake Lifter Stainless Steel, 8.75 Inch, Black, Silver
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1| Style Name:Cake LifterNo matter the cake or cookie lifting situation, we offer a spatula that takes your baking to the next level. Fat Daddio's spatulas are the perfect tool for baking and decorating. The jumbo spatula works great for transferring cake tiers. The stainless steel blade is flexible for minimal effort while baking. The handles are designed for durability and are impact resistant. Dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: DESIGNED for lifting cakes, pastries and cookies with ease. Professionals use cake lifters for transferring cake tiers.
DURABLE COMFORT GRIP HANDLE that is impact resistant.
18-GAUGE STAINLESS STEEL - 8.75 x 7 inch blade, 16.5 inch overall length
